short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disable Google Search results auto translation feature. Auto redirect away from Google Translate proxy to the original URL page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
To help address content and perspective gaps when a user searches in their local language, sometimes Google may translate the title link and snippet of a search result for results that aren't in the language of the search query.

There is no easy way to just disable this feature, so this extension is here to help until Google provide a way to disable it.

Git repository: https://github.com/lnoss/no-google-search-translation
